hints.content:
Start at $110$ and count by $1$'s.

When you get to $117$, go one more.

To go one more, find $117$ on the chart.

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c7fb0e9db775b0647f20a52345cf52dd.png)

What comes right after $117$ on the chart?

question.content:
**What whole number comes right after $117$? **  

 [[☃ input-number 1]]
